mapper.select: SELECT password FROM tbl_member WHERE email = #{email}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_member ( email, password, nickname, birth_date, join_date, gender, introduction, profile_img ) VALUES ( #{email}, #{password}, #{nickName}, #{birth_date}, #{join_date}, #{gender}, #{introduction}, #{profile_img} )
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_member SET birth_date = to_date(#{birth_date jdbcType="Date"},'yyyy-MM-dd') WHERE email = #{email}
UPDATE tbl_member SET join_date = to_date(#{join_date jdbcType="Date"},'yyyy-MM-dd') WHERE email = #{email}
